item.title: All About Perfect Money
item.dc:creator: Leyli Mamikhani
item.description:
Welcome to your ultimate guide to Perfect Money – your ticket to hassle-free online transactions!  In this article, we’re here to walk you through everything there is to know about Perfect Money, from its beginnings to its standout features, perks, and security measures.  Whether you’re a seasoned pro eager to unlock more from your Perfect […]

The post All About Perfect Money appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to your ultimate guide to Perfect Money – your ticket to hassle-free online transactions!

 In this article, we’re here to walk you through everything there is to know about Perfect Money, from its beginnings to its standout features, perks, and security measures. 

Whether you’re a seasoned pro eager to unlock more from your Perfect Money experience or a newcomer curious about how it can simplify your online finances, you’re in good hands.

 So let’s embark on this journey into the world of Perfect Money together!

What is Perfect Money?

Perfect Money is an e-currency used for making payments on the internet. It is widely accepted as payment option by countless platforms. With Perfect Money, you can do a lot! 

Be it transferring funds to others or pay for goods and services. Or how about buying cryptocurrencies or even buying fiat currencies. It is a seriously popular payment method for online users. An additional capability is to loan and receipt issuance throughout the system. 

The biggest downside of Perfect Money, however, is that you cannot cash Perfect money to your bank account on its website directly. For that, you will need a platform like CoinCannon to exchange your Perfect Money to PayPal and other e-currencies.

How Dose Perfect Money Works?

Perfect Money as a user-friendly digital payment system function as an electronic wallet, allowing users to securely send and receive payments with ease. 

To get started, simply sign up for an account and fund it through various methods like bank transfers or cryptocurrency exchanges. Sending money to friends or paying for goods and services is quick and straightforward – just enter the recipient’s details and the amount, and you’re good to go. 

Perfect Money supports multiple currencies and offers competitive exchange rates for currency conversion. With robust security measures in place, such as encryption and two-factor authentication, you can trust that your transactions are safe and secure. 

Plus, withdrawing funds is a breeze with various withdrawal options available. Whether you’re an individual or a business, Perfect Money provides a convenient and reliable solution for your online payment needs.

The Benefits of Using Perfect Money for Online Transactions

With Perfect Money, enjoy the benefits of seamless online transactions and peace of mind knowing that your payments are handled efficiently and securely. So let me tell you about the advantages of using perfect money for your online transactions:

  1. Effortless Transactions: Enjoy a hassle-free payment experience with Perfect Money’s streamlined process for sending and receiving funds online.
  2. Speedy Payments: Say goodbye to delays – Perfect Money ensures swift transactions, allowing you to complete payments quickly and efficiently. 
  3. Versatile Usage: Whether you’re paying bills, shopping online, or sending money to friends and family, Perfect Money accommodates a variety of transaction needs. 
  4. Top-notch Security: Rest easy knowing that your financial information is safe and secure with Perfect Money’s advanced encryption and robust security measures. 
  5. User-Friendly Interface: Navigate with ease through Perfect Money’s intuitive platform, making it simple to manage your finances and transactions. 
  6. Convenient Currency Options: Perfect Money supports multiple currencies, offering flexibility and convenience for users around the globe.
  7. Trusted by Millions: Join the millions of satisfied users who rely on Perfect Money for their online payment needs and experience the convenience firsthand.

One of the most popular exchange directions on Perfect Money is “To exchange Perfect Money to PayPal.” For more information about this exchange direction on CoinCannon, you can read: “How to Exchange Perfect Money USD to PayPal USD.“

Security Features of Perfect Money: Keeping Your Funds Safe

In the case of transactions, of course security is the most important! Perfect Money with robust security features in place, prioritizes the safety and security of your funds, providing you with peace of mind when conducting transactions online.

Here are the security features of Perfect Money, ensuring the safety of your funds:

  • Advanced Encryption: Perfect Money employs state-of-the-art encryption technology to safeguard your sensitive data and financial information from unauthorized access.
  • Two-Factor Authentication (2FA): Enhance your account security with 2FA, adding an extra layer of protection by requiring a secondary verification method, such as a code sent to your mobile device, in addition to your password. 
  • Transaction Monitoring: Perfect Money continuously monitors transactions for suspicious activity, helping to detect and prevent fraudulent transactions in real-time.
  • Secure Login: Protect your account from unauthorized access with secure login protocols, including CAPTCHA verification and session timeouts, ensuring that only authorized users can access your account. 
  • IP Restrictions: Customize security settings by restricting account access to specific IP addresses or IP ranges, preventing unauthorized logins from unknown locations.
  • Account Verification: Verify your identity and account details through Perfect Money’s verification process, adding an extra layer of security to your account and transactions.

Exploring Perfect Money Exchange Options and Rates

Let’s take a friendly stroll through Perfect Money’s exchange options and rates! 

With Perfect Money, you’re in for a treat when it comes to currency conversion. Enjoy the convenience of exchanging between multiple currencies seamlessly, right from the comfort of your account. 

What’s even better? Perfect Money offers competitive exchange rates, ensuring you get the best value for your money every time.

Need to convert funds in a hurry? No problem! With real-time exchange options, you can make currency conversions instantly whenever the need arises. 

Plus, with a variety of exchange methods available, including bank transfers, cryptocurrency exchanges, and more, you’ll have the flexibility to choose the option that suits you best. And don’t worry about hidden fees – Perfect Money maintains a transparent fee structure, keeping you informed every step of the way. 

So go ahead, manage your funds with ease and efficiency, all while enjoying the friendly and intuitive interface of Perfect Money.

Common Questions About Perfect Money: FAQs Answered

Let’s address some common questions about Perfect Money:

What is Perfect Money?

Perfect Money is a digital payment system that allows users to securely send and receive payments online, similar to an electronic wallet.

How do I sign up for a Perfect Money account?

Signing up for a Perfect Money account is easy! Simply visit the Perfect Money website, click on the “Sign Up” button, and follow the prompts to create your account.

What currencies does Perfect Money support?

Perfect Money supports multiple currencies, including USD, EUR, GBP, and others, allowing users to transact in their preferred currency.

How can I fund my Perfect Money account?

You can fund your Perfect Money account through various methods, including bank transfers, cryptocurrency exchanges, and other online payment systems.

Is Perfect Money safe to use?

Yes, Perfect Money prioritizes security and employs advanced encryption technology to protect users’ sensitive information and funds.

Are there any fees associated with using Perfect Money?

While Perfect Money does charge fees for certain transactions, the fee structure is transparent, and users are informed of any fees before completing transactions.

Can I withdraw funds from my Perfect Money account?

from your Perfect Money account through various withdrawal options, such as bank transfers, prepaid cards, and cryptocurrency withdrawals.

Is Perfect Money available worldwide?

Yes, Perfect Money is available to users worldwide, allowing individuals and businesses from different countries to access its services.

How can I contact Perfect Money customer support?

If you have any questions or need assistance, you can reach out to Perfect Money customer support through their website or by email.

Can I use Perfect Money for online shopping and payments?

Yes, Perfect Money can be used for online shopping and payments at merchants that accept Perfect Money as a payment method.

That being said, you can also buy cryptocurrencies with Perfect Money USD on CoinCannon.

If you have any questions about Perfect Money, check out FAQ on Perfect Money Exchange Services

The post All About Perfect Money appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: How to Exchange Payeer USD to PayPal [2024 Update]
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
Are you looking to exchange Payeer USD to PayPal effortlessly?CoinCannon is here to help!With 24/7 online support and no hidden fees, CoinCannon makes swapping your digital funds quick and easy.In today’s digital world, relying on a single payment system just isn’t practical. We often need to use multiple services to meet various needs, each offering […]

The post How to Exchange Payeer USD to PayPal [2024 Update] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
Are you looking to exchange Payeer USD to PayPal effortlessly?
CoinCannon is here to help!
With 24/7 online support and no hidden fees, CoinCannon makes swapping your digital funds quick and easy.
In today’s digital world, relying on a single payment system just isn’t practical. We often need to use multiple services to meet various needs, each offering unique benefits. However, transferring funds between different wallets can be a real pain and can cost you a pretty penny.Fortunately, CoinCannon offers a fantastic solution to this problem.

In this article, we’ll walk you through the simple steps to exchange Payeer USD to PayPal without any hassle and zero hidden fees.

What Do I Need to Exchange Payeer USD to PayPal?

For this transaction, you will be sending Payeer USD and Receiving PayPal in your desired currency. Naturally, you will need verified and active accounts for both Payeer and PayPal. Make sure that the exchange amount does not exceed your withdrawal and deposit limits on both accounts. As for CoinCannon, all you need is an email-address since no KYC (know your customer) is necessary. However, bear in mind that there are many advantages available for those who sign up on CoinCannon.

Exchanging Payeer USD for PayPal: 2024 New Rules and Updates

In 2024, there have been several updates and new rules that might affect the process of exchanging Payeer USD to PayPal. Here are the key points you need to know:

  1. PayPal Policy Updates:
    • Purchase Protection Program: Amendments to PayPal’s Purchase Protection Program became effective on May 20, 2024. These changes could impact how disputes and claims are handled when using PayPal.
    • Charities and Online Card Payment Services: There have been updates to the terms and conditions for PayPal Confirmed Charities and Online Card Payment Services, also effective from May 20, 2024.
  2. IRS Reporting Requirements:
    • Starting January 1, 2024, the IRS has implemented new reporting requirements for payments received for goods and services. The reporting threshold has been lowered to $600 USD for the 2024 tax season, down from the previous threshold of $20,000 USD and 200 transactions. This means that if you receive $600 USD or more in payments through PayPal, it will be reported to the IRS.
  3. Fee Structure Changes:
    • Effective April 17, 2024, PayPal has updated its fee structure. For example, the fees for Advanced Credit and Debit Card transactions have been revised. This could affect the overall cost of transactions when exchanging funds between Payeer and PayPal.
  4. Exchange Rates and Best Practices:
    • When exchanging Payeer USD to PayPal USD, it’s important to consider the exchange rates offered by different exchangers. Websites like BestChange.com provide a list of exchangers with the best rates at the top, along with reviews and reserves to help you make an informed decision.

By staying informed about these updates and following best practices, you can ensure a smooth and cost-effective exchange process between Payeer USD and PayPal in 2024.

How to Exchange Payeer USD to PayPal?

  • Select Payeer from the box on the left and PayPal on the right.
  • Enter the Payeer amount you want to exchange to PayPal and behold the most competitive exchange rates!
  • Before clicking “Next”, please read the instructions and “PayPal fees guide” carefully.
  •  By clicking “Next” and enter your PayPal details and your email address. Please note that we contact you using the email address you provide therefore it’s important that you enter a valid email address.
  • Once again, press Next, and you are taken to the next level where you are asked to review your order. Please click on Review and Check. Read and agree to the terms and AML policy.
  • By clicking on “Confirm” you are taken to the 4th and last step where you have to pay your order.
  • Make sure to copy your order’s track ID and then click on the “Confirm Payment” button. You will be taken to Payeer payment gateway where you can pay your order.
  • Once you completed the payment, you will be redirected to CoinCannon and will see a message confirming your payment.
  • Now just sit back and enjoy the money that soon will be in your PayPal account.

Success!

The Exchange process will start as soon as you finish the steps above, your order will be checked and the PayPal will be send to your account.

Viva La CoinCannon!

Of course, in order to exchange Payeer to PayPal, you will first need a reliable exchange platform. For that, CoinCannon is one of the best options out there.

Every exchange platform must maintain three important characteristics. Anonymity, affordability and reliability. We pride ourselves as a professional platform that offers all three.

For anonymity, CoinCannon requires no KYC or even a sign up process. The best way to protect your information is to not share them with anyone. And for that, we respect our customers and do not ask for their personal info.

As for affordability, CoinCannon utilizes an automated system to determine the best exchange rates at any moment. By doing so, we have managed to stay on top of the ranks on websites such as Bestchange and OkChanger.

jolixo usually takes care of your transaction in 1 hour but in some cases it might take up to 24 hours to complete your order. In the meantime, you will have a track id to follow up on your order. Simply enter the main page and type in your track id in the specified field to see your live order status. Keep in mind that your track id is private information and you should not share it with anyone else.

The post How to Exchange Payeer USD to PayPal [2024 Update] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: Exchange Payeer USD to Other Currencies [Step-by-Step]
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
If you are looking to exchange Payeer USD to cryptocurrencies or digital currencies, you might want to read how to exchange Payeer to PayPal first. Don’t forget you can always exchange Payeer to cryptocurrency or other currencies here at CoinCannon. the transaction and requirements might be a bit confusing. Luckily, this post will provide a […]

The post Exchange Payeer USD to Other Currencies [Step-by-Step] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
If you are looking to exchange Payeer USD to cryptocurrencies or digital currencies, you might want to read how to exchange Payeer to PayPal first. Don’t forget you can always exchange Payeer to cryptocurrency or other currencies here at CoinCannon. the transaction and requirements might be a bit confusing. Luckily, this post will provide a step-by step guide on how to send Payeer USD to another wallet. Furthermore, you will learn how to find your account number and operation id.

How to Exchange Payeer USD

To begin with, you must first enter your Payeer account. As you log in, you are directed to the Dashboard. From there, you can navigate to different menus.

For this article, we demonstrate how to make a transaction. In order to make the payment, click on the “Transfer” menu on the left sidebar menu.

On the Transfer page, type the destination account number, remember that if it is a Payeer account, the number will start with the letter “P”. Following that, type the desired amount you want to transfer. To finish the transfer, simply click on “Send” button.

If you are new to Payeer, you can learn all about the platform on “What is Payeer” article.

Payeer Account Number

To exchange Payeer USD, you need to give the exchange platform your account number so that they can transfer funds to your account. To find account number, simply click on the account menu on the top-right. The account number and other information will appear and you can easily copy the number.

Payeer Operation ID

The operation id is a dedicated identification code that holds the transfer information for a transaction. To exchange Payeer USD on any platform, you will need this id to prove your payment firs. The operation id is simple to find. To do so, first click on the “History” on the left sidebar.

In the page that appears, you can see all your previous transaction. For the specific transaction, click on the ID. By clicking on the ID, information about the transaction will appear and you can see the operation id. Simply copy it and use it on the exchange platform.

Exchange Payeer USD on CoinCannon

jolixo is a decentralized online platform to exchange your cryptocurrencies and e-currencies. We utilize an automated system to determine the best exchange rates at any moment. Furthermore, CoinCannon does not require complex KYC or a sign-up process. Backed by 24/7 customer support, our great reviews on Bestchange and Trustpilot is a testament of our good will. You can easily swap Payeer to PayPal or other Digital currencies or CRyptocurrencies on CoinCannon.

For more instructional content, you can always visit CoinCannon Blog

The post Exchange Payeer USD to Other Currencies [Step-by-Step] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
In Boomer terms, a Perfect Money E-Voucher is basically like a bank check but digital. Basically, users can create a Perfect Money E-Voucher with a certain value and use it as a redeemable transaction for a variety of purposes. Thankfully, these vouchers are instantly redeemable via a code and a pin which could easily be […]

The post How to Create Perfect Money E-Voucher [Including Video] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
In Boomer terms, a Perfect Money E-Voucher is basically like a bank check but digital. Basically, users can create a Perfect Money E-Voucher with a certain value and use it as a redeemable transaction for a variety of purposes. Thankfully, these vouchers are instantly redeemable via a code and a pin which could easily be sent via SMS, E-mail or any form of online messaging. In terms of use cases, the applications are endless since it is an accessible form of payment for both the sender and the receiver. In this article, we will go through everything you need to know about the Perfect Money E-Voucher and how to make one instantly.

Buy Perfect Money Voucher Now!

Perfect Money E-Voucher

it is easy, it is affordable and it is anonymous a lot like the CoinCannon Platform! The E-Voucher is the solution to some of our biggest payment problems. The electronic voucher is a method of payment that is redeemable instantly. The user pays a specific amount of funds and creates a voucher. Then, the information for the voucher can easily be delivered to the receiver and they will have the choice to redeem the payment anytime they want. Much like a gift card or a bank check, the voucher will hold the value permanently since the payment has already been made.

Although there are numerous applications for this, here are some of the common utilities:

  • You can create a voucher to make payments when you don’t have access to your Perfect Money account.
  • Perfect Money E-Voucher is a good method of payment when you don’t carry cash or traveling abroad.
  • As a service provider, users can receive vouchers if they don’t wish to reveal their account address.
  • Send your loved ones a voucher instead of a gift card

Perfect Money E-Voucher does not cost users a lot of money to make! You can simply go to CoinCannon and create your voucher immediately with the lowest fees. On top of that, unlike a majority of exchanges, CoinCannon does not require KYC (know your customer) or even a sign up process. It is truly fast and truly anonymous.

What is Perfect Money?

Perfect Money is an e-currency for making payments on the internet. It is widely accepted as payment option by countless platforms. With Perfect Money, you can do a lot! Be it transferring funds to others or pay for goods and services. Or how about buying cryptocurrencies or even buying fiat currencies. It is a seriously popular payment method for online users. An additional capability is to loan and receipt issuance throughout the system.

The biggest downside of Perfect Money, however, is that you cannot cash Perfect money to your bank account on its website directly. For that, you will need a platform like CoinCannon to exchange your Perfect Money to PayPal and other e-currencies.

CoinCannon Does It Better!

Essentially, you need three primary qualities in an ideal exchange platform. Anonymity, good rates and reliability. The CoinCannon team consists of traders and professionals who have felt the need for an ideal exchange and pursued their vision.

First and foremost, all users need to protect their personal information especially when it comes down to financial transactions. Unfortunately, a vast majority of exchange apps and platforms make massive profits off of selling user data. Best case scenario, they are legally bound to disclose user information with national authorities for any reason. In that regard, the best method to protect your privacy is to not disclose them with anyone at all. CoinCannon does not require customers to go through KYC (know your customer) or even a mandatory sign up. In that regard, it is simply as safe as one can get making an exchange.

On the other hand, privacy is not a reason to pay more on your exchange. With that in mind, the platform offers some of the most competitive exchange rates you can find anywhere. Don’t take our word for it. You can simply pay a visit to ranking websites such as BestChange or OkChanger and see compare our rates with others.

Last but not least, not everything goes as planned in the digital world. Subsequently, the platform provides true online 24/7 customer support for the users.

How to Create Perfect Money E-Voucher?

  1. Enter the homepage first, then select Perfect Money and Perfect Money E-Voucher from the options in the first step. Enter the amount you want to exchange. Following that, you will see how much USD will be in your E-Voucher
  2. Press Exchange and you will go to the next stage where you will enter your E-mail address and phone number (it’s optional).
  3. One more time, click on the “Exchange” button and you will go to the next step where you will review your order.
  4. Complete the captcha and click on exchange to go to the next step where you will obtain a tracking ID. Press the “Pay Order” button to go to the Perfect Money gateway and make the payment to our Perfect Money account. Having transferred your Perfect Money to CoinCannon, your order will process very quickly.
  5. By finishing all the steps above, our team of professionals will create your e-voucher and send the details to you via E-mail.

Keep in mind, you can also see your E-Voucher information in Admin description section after that your order completed by using your Track ID. Also, if your Perfect Money account isn’t verified, your send fee will be 1.99 %

Done

When you finish the steps above, our team will immediately process your order and create your e-voucher. The process will take between 3 to 20 minutes. In the meantime, you can spend some time reading some of the latest crypto news on CoinCannon Blog. Remember that our support team is online 24/7 to answer all your questions.

The post How to Create Perfect Money E-Voucher [Including Video] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.description:
If you’re looking to exchange AdvCash to Payeer USD with the best exchange rates, look no further than CoinCannon. Today, we will go over how […]

The post Exchange AdvCash to Payeer USD [No KYC] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
If you’re looking to exchange AdvCash to Payeer USD with the best exchange rates, look no further than jolixo. These days, various e-wallets and payments systems make it harder to keep all our funds in one place. With that, we will need to exchange e-currencies on a regular basis. Today, we will go over how to exchange AdvCash to Payeer USD on CoinCannon with a step-by-step guide. Furthermore, you will learn about the many benefits of using CoinCannon platform.

What Do I Need to Exchange AdvCash to Payeer?

For this exchange pair, you will need both an AdvCash and Payeer account. Depending on transaction amount, you may or may not need verified accounts for the exchange. Please make sure to learn about unverified account transaction limitations before making the exchange.

What is AdvCash?

AdvCash is a currency used for online payments. It is based in Belize which provides immunity from national laws of other countries for it. As an offshore currency, it is also encrypted much like cryptocurrencies and benefits from better anonymity and security. The Advance Cash company provides an account for users that allows for a variety of currencies to operate through it. In many ways, it is a lot like Payeer.

And much like Payeer, AdvCash supports transfers in both fiat and cryptocurrency form. With a virtual wallet, users can transfer funds and make payments with very low commission. What makes it interesting, is that Advance Cash is also compatible with other payment systems such as WebMoney or Perfect Money. With free international transfers, users get to enjoy a wide variety of currencies all in a virtual wallet. Furthermore, there are both physical and virtual bank cards available for quick and cheap international Visa/Mastercard payments.

The company was founded in 2014 as a competitor for PayPal and much like its peers, it has gained notable success in the past few years. As the need for virtual banking grows, online payment processing companies continue to narrow the gap with PayPal. Although, such companies are not as popular as PayPal, they offer a lot more freedom.

Keep in mind that you can also Exchange AdvCash to PayPal.

What is Payeer?

First and foremost, Payeer is considered an online digital wallet for better asset management. Be it crypto of fiat, the payment processor is quick, reliable and cheap. In that regard, in a short lifespan of almost 8 years, Payeer is now recognized as one of the very best amongst competitors. Payeer utilizes built-in payment services with giant financial services such as Mastercard, VISA and PayPal.

As of 2021, the Payeer has approximately 7 million users which can transfer funds to each other with extremely low fees. The strength however, lies in diversity. Payeer is far ahead of any similar platform in terms of scale of operation and diversity in supported payment methods. With more than 50 payment approaches, the Payeer wallet offers users various services in one place.

To learn more about Payeer, continue reading “What is Payeer?”

CoinCannon for the Win!

CoinCannon is an online exchange that offers everything you need from a platform.

Truthfully, it is a rare combination for an online exchange to offer anonymity, lowest exchange rates and unparalleled reliability altogether.

We respect our customer’s privacy by not asking for their personal information. The best way for anyone to protect their information is to not disclose them at all. In that regard, not having KYC or sign up is the best method.

Furthermore, the platform utilizes an automated system to determine the best exchange rates at all times. Our words sound too good? Just pay a visit to ranking websites such as BestChange and OkChanger and see for yourself.

Lastly, according to Murphy’s law “anything that can go wrong will go wrong”. To stay ahead of any problems, we offer 24/7 customer support.

How to Exchange AdvCash to Payeer USD?

  1. Enter the homepage first, then select AdvCash USD and Payeer USD from the options in the first step. Enter the amount you want to exchange. Following that, the amount of Payeer USD you will receive will automatically calculate.
  2. Press Exchange and you will go to the next stage where you will enter your AdvCash and Payeer wallet details and email. The phone number is optional.
  3. One more time, click on the “Exchange” button and you will go to the next step where you will review your order.
  4. Complete the captcha and click on exchange to go to the next step where you will obtain a tracking ID. Press the “Pay Order” button to go to the AdvCash gateway and make the payment to our AdvCash account. Having transferred your AdvCash USD to CoinCannon, your order will process very quickly.
  5. By finishing all the steps above, our team will send the Payeer to your wallet as soon as possible

Done!

Just like that, you have now exchanged AdvCash to PayPal. In general, Payeer payments are inconsistent in terms of how long they might take. Give it a few minutes and the Payeer USD will be in your account ASAP. In the meantime, you can follow up on your order using the Track ID provided for you. Simply enter the track id in the required section on homepage to see at which point your order is. Remember not to share your Track ID with anyone else.

The post Exchange AdvCash to Payeer USD [No KYC] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: WebMoney Review 2024, WebMoney Remarkable Achievements
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
For this WebMoney review, there will be no need for introduction. Undoubtedly, almost all traders are at least familiar with WM let alone working with the payment system. It is arguably the first anonymity-based payment system with a global success due to its emphasis on privacy. But, so much privacy meant that they had to […]

The post WebMoney Review 2024, WebMoney Remarkable Achievements appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
For this WebMoney review, there will be no need for introduction. Undoubtedly, almost all traders are at least familiar with WM let alone working with the payment system. It is arguably the first anonymity-based payment system with a global success due to its emphasis on privacy. But, so much privacy meant that they had to compromise somewhere. Therefore, WM has always been a payment system that works hard yet plays hard too! Considering the overwhelming legal limitations, we’re doing a WebMoney review to see if it can hold up with the competition in the saturated sector.

What is Webmoney?

WebMoney is an online payment system and a comprehensive tool for online business operations. It was originally developed as a money transfer system for US dollars in Russia in 1998 and since then, nearly 40 million people from all over the globe have joined the program.

WebMoney provides digital currency purses that can hold popular national currencies. The payment platform provides a P2P credit purse, global payment solutions, retail services, local payment products, online billing, and direct integration with other global financial service providers. On top of that, a number of countries worldwide are currently working on WebMoney and consumers pay WebMoney for the services of different companies from Spain, Poland, and Belgium.

Essentially, you can trace back a lot of the crypto and DeFi ideas back to WM. In that regard, it is more of an effort to circumvent unnecessary banking regulations. A decade before Bitcoin, WM was one of the few payment systems independent of banking.

WebMoney Transaction Fees

Primarily, WM offers very low exchange fees hence the popularity with Forex traders. The network charges fees only from sending while the receiver doesn’t pay anything. Sending WM units cost $0.8% per transaction while the minimum fee remains at 0.01. for all the fees an tariffs, you can visit the system fees section on their official website.

WM Account

Basically, WebMoney utilizes a “pay-as-you-go” basis which eliminates long-term commitment. With that, users can cancel at any time. But, for this model, you will have to find a reliable exchange platform to deposit and withdraw. This will allow WM to provide an affordable system to replace risky merchant accounts and offshore merchant accounts.

Thankfully, we have just the right exchange platform to introduce in this WebMoney review 2024.

WebMoney 2024: Remarkable Achievements

In a milestone year marked by its 25th anniversary, WebMoney has been on an impressive journey of service enhancement and innovation, striving to deliver cutting-edge solutions to its valued users.

One of the notable advancements this year includes the introduction of a Telegram bot to the WebMoney Keeper, accompanied by a host of updates to our applications. Among its many features, the new bot empowers users to create direct donation links easily shared through Telegram, websites, or QR codes.

Throughout the year 2023, WebMoney users have enjoyed the freedom of conducting transfers without geographical limitations, enabling seamless transactions to bank accounts and cards across various currencies, including dollars, euros, and yuan.

In response to user demand, a new WMS wallet in Uzbek sums was introduced, further expanding the platform’s currency options. Additionally, users can now conveniently transfer funds from their WMT wallet in USDT directly to a bank card, streamlining financial management processes.

With the addition of over 100 new services for payment in WMZ, WMT, and WMS, encompassing mobile operators and popular games, WebMoney continues to evolve to meet diverse user needs. Furthermore, the platform has broadened the range of available currencies in its WebMoney Debt service, providing greater flexibility for financial transactions.

Exciting updates from WebMoney’s partners further enhance the user experience, with significant improvements to the Paymer digital checks service and the addition of new cryptocurrencies on the INDX exchange.

Looking ahead to the future, WebMoney remains optimistic and committed to delivering innovative solutions that empower users to achieve their financial goals. As we embark on the journey ahead, we invite our users to join us in celebrating our achievements and embracing the possibilities that lie ahead in 2024.

CoinCannon Platform

jolixo platform is an official WebMoney partner with a solid Business Level rating. Using CoinCannon, you can deposit into you WebMoney account or withdraw WM units. CoinCannon does not charge any additional fees for Webmoney transactions therefore it remains as one of the best exchange platforms for this purpose. In fact, Webmoney to PayPal is our most popular exchange direction because of the affordability and reliability.

On top of that, CoinCannon offers multiple benefits for WM users. For one, the platform does not require mandatory KYC or even sign up. This is in fact the best way to protect your private information since you wouldn’t have to disclose them with anyone.

As for reliability, CoinCannon offers 24/7 online customer service to ensure the utmost quality of service.

WebMoney Review: Pros and Cons

Pros

  • Instant Payments
  • Low exchange fees
  • Eliminates the need for credit card in Forex
  • Great for offshore payments

Cons

  • Customer support in English is subpar
  • Not available globally
  • Blocking virtual wallets
  • Security could be better

Conclusion

For this WebMoney review in 2024, we could only say that WebMoney is good as long as you can use it. Meaning that the service is facing sanctions in the US and western Europe. If you have access to WM services, it is an affordable and instant payment system so long as you use a solid exchange platform like CoinCannon.

item.content:encoded:
Perfect Money is one of the best payments systems out there. While offering low exchange fees and instant transfers, the network is secure, fast and reliable. However, in order to use Perfect Money Exchange Services, you will need an exchange platform.

However, the exchange rates as well as the quality of service may differ and it is not that easy to find the best platform. Thankfully, CoinCannon is a certified Perfect Money partner with great user ratings and highly competitive exchange rates.

In this article, we will go over some of the most common questions regarding Perfect Money exchange services.

Exchange Your Perfect Money Right Now!

Common Questions on Perfect Money Exchange Services

Do I need to use an exchanger for PM?

Yes, you will need to use an exchange service provider. Service providers help diversify payment options for Perfect Money users. With that, exchangers can help users to access their PM account via different payment systems, cash, money transfers, bank wires, credit cards and other tools. This will allow Perfect Money services to be much more practical as a payment option with much better availability.

And, this is not just for deposits, working with exchange platforms allows PM users to have the ability to withdraw into various forms of payments. You can withdraw into credit cards, bank accounts or simply cash.

What is the best exchange platform for Perfect Money?

Users have a variety of options to choose from in certified Perfect Money partners. However, CoinCannon platform offers pretty much everything you might need from an exchange service provider. For one, CoinCannon utilizes and automated system to determine the lowest possible exchange rates at any moment. In that regard, users will benefit from highly competitive fees. But, there are other benefactors such as privacy and reliability to consider.

To address these issues, CoinCannon does not require KYC or Sign Up. This will allow the user to benefit from the utmost anonymity. After all, the best way to protect your personal information is to not disclose them at all.

Lastly, the platform offers 24/7 online customer support to ensure the best quality of service and reliability.

Where do I see the list of certified PM partners?

You can see the official list of partners on Perfect Money website. Note that it is very important to use an exchange service that is official partner with PM. The payment system utilizes and robust and reliable procedure to certify and exchanger like CoinCannon. Subsequently, it is very important to choose a platform that has been registered and verified.

How do I see the Perfect Money Fees?

On jolixo, you can see the exact fee on your Perfect Money transfer when you type in the exchange amount in the first step. CoinCannon does not charge any additional exchange fees on any transaction.

How do I exchange Perfect Money to PayPal?

You can learn how to exchange Perfect Money to PayPal instantly on CoinCannon with a step by step guide. Furthermore, the video guide is also included in the article.

Can I buy cryptocurrencies with Perfect Money?

Yes, you can buy crypto with Perfect Money USD on CoinCannon with the lowest exchange fees. All you need is a verified Perfect Money account and a crypto wallet. Head over to CoinCannon to learn more.

Can I create Perfect Money E-voucher on PM website?

No, you will need an exchange service provider to create an e-voucher.

Is Perfect Money a good payment system to use?

Considering the quality of service and a wide use case, PM is a solid payment system. However, depending on your location, it may not be available in your region.

Verdict

While Perfect Money exchange services are excellent, choosing the right exchange service provider is very important. To begin with, you should make sure to pick an exchanger that is official PM partner. On top of that, finding a platform that offers both low fees and reliability is not an easy task. Thankfully, CoinCannon checks all the right boxes as a certified PM partner.

item.title: Perfect Money Review 2024
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
Every year, payments systems evolve and upgrade to keep up with the competition. In this article we will provide a Perfect Money review for 2024 to see if the e-transfer system is still relevant. But more importantly, we try to answer whether Perfect Money is actually perfect or not. With that, we have a pros […]

The post Perfect Money Review 2024 appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
Every year, payments systems evolve and upgrade to keep up with the competition. In this article we will provide a Perfect Money review for 2024 to see if the e-transfer system is still relevant. But more importantly, we try to answer whether Perfect Money is actually perfect or not. With that, we have a pros and cons list to take an objective look in this Perfect Money review. On top of that, you will learn how CoinCannon can provide a safe and secure exchange platform for all your PM transfers.

What is Perfect Money?

Perfect Money is an e-currency for making payments on the internet. It is widely accepted as payment option by countless platforms. With Perfect Money, you can do a lot! Be it transferring funds to others or pay for goods and services. Or how about buying cryptocurrencies or even buying fiat currencies. It is a seriously popular payment method for online users. An additional capability is to loan and receipt issuance throughout the system.

The biggest downside of Perfect Money, however, is that you cannot cash Perfect money to your bank account on its website directly. For that, you will need a platform like CoinCannon to exchange your Perfect Money to PayPal and other e-currencies.

To learn all about Perfect Money continue reading: “All About Perfect Money”

Perfect Money Voucher

It is easy, it is affordable and it is anonymous a lot like the CoinCannon Platform! The E-Voucher is the solution to some of our biggest payment problems. The electronic voucher is a method of payment that is redeemable instantly. The user pays a specific amount of funds and creates a voucher. Then, the information for the voucher can easily be delivered to the receiver and they will have the choice to redeem the payment anytime they want. Much like a gift card or a bank check, the voucher will hold the value permanently since the payment has already been made.

Although there are numerous applications for this, here are some of the common utilities:

  • You can create a voucher to make payments when you don’t have access to your Perfect Money account.
  • Perfect Money E-Voucher is a good method of payment when you don’t carry cash or traveling abroad.
  • As a service provider, users can receive vouchers if they don’t wish to reveal their account address.
  • Send your loved ones a voucher instead of a gift card

Perfect Money E-Voucher does not cost users a lot of money to make! You can simply go to CoinCannon and create your voucher immediately with the lowest fees. On top of that, unlike a majority of exchanges, CoinCannon does not require KYC (know your customer) or even a sign up process. It is truly fast and truly anonymous.

Learn how to create a Perfect Money E-Voucher

Perfect Money Review 2024

Unfortunately, Perfect Money does have some flaws and depending on the context, it could fall behind other payment systems. In that regard, you should always know the specific details about service providers. Here are some of the notable pros and cons for Perfect Money review:

Pros:

  • Instant transactions on deposit and withdrawal
  • Diversity in options for deposit and withdrawal
  • 4% interest rate per year on account
  • Assets are secure
  • Very low transaction fees

Cons:

  • Premium account is difficult to attain
  • The English language on the official website is confusing at best
  • The founder remains anonymous
  • Few online businesses support PM
  • Minimum balance of $100 and minimum wire deposit of $300
  • Certified exchange service provider can charge their own fees

Perfect Money 2023 Achievements & 2024 New Plans

Throughout the past year, Perfect Money has dedicated itself to improving its platform, with updates ranging from enhanced security features to an expanded range of payment options. The platform’s reliability and stability have been key factors in attracting new users and maintaining strong partnerships with over 400 exchange partners worldwide.

One of the highlights of the year has been the significant increase in Perfect Money’s user base, which has grown by an impressive 6 million, reaching a total of around 20 million users globally. This growth is a testament to the platform’s reputation for excellence and its ability to meet the evolving needs of its users.

In addition to expanding its user base, Perfect Money has also expanded its geographical reach, offering payment operations in over 200 countries and facilitating transactions in more than 50 fiat currencies. This broad global presence has made Perfect Money a trusted payment partner for tens of thousands of companies around the world.

Perfect Money’s commitment to customer satisfaction has also been recognized, with the platform receiving high ratings and positive feedback from users. With a rating of 4.5 out of 5 on leading review platforms and a satisfaction rate of 97% among users, Perfect Money’s dedication to providing excellent service is evident.

Looking ahead to Perfect Money 2024, it remains focused on delivering innovative financial solutions and continuing to meet the needs of its growing user base. With a team dedicated to excellence and a commitment to customer satisfaction, Perfect Money is poised for continued success in the new year.

As the year comes to a close, Perfect Money extends its warmest wishes to all its users for a joyous holiday season and a prosperous new year. Here’s to a perfect 2024!

Certified Partner: CoinCannon

As mentioned, Perfect Money certified partners can charge extra exchange fees on transactions. On top of that, they will also have access to user information hence the exchange process is not anonymous. However, CoinCannon platform eliminates both these problems and provides a perfect exchange service for the user. CoinCannon is a certified Perfect Money partner.

To begin with, CoinCannon does not charge any exchange fees on Perfect Money transactions. With that, you will be sure to pay the least amount of commission on each transaction.

As for anonymity, CoinCannon does not require KYC or sign up. So, your information will be safe and the transaction will remain anonymous.

As for the cherry on top, the platform does also provide online 24/7 customer support.

Subsequently, it is worth mentioning in this Perfect Money review that choosing the right exchange service provider is actually very important for PM users.

Did you know you can easily exchange Perfect Money to Paypal?
Learn: How to Exchange Perfect Money USD to PayPal USD [Video Guide] – Updated 2024

Conclusion, Perfect Money Review 2024

In general, Perfect Money is actually solid and good. However, the biggest downside is the small network of online businesses supporting PM. That remains to be the biggest bummer for the network. On top of that, choosing the right exchange service provider is very important but CoinCannon ticks all the right boxes for that. The Perfect Money e-voucher is actually great and has so many use cases.

The post Perfect Money Review 2024 appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: What is AdvCash? Underrated E-Wallet!
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
E-wallets have been a great online service for payment solutions. And of course, there are multiple options to choose from. However, for those in need of hassle-free regulations, the options become very much limited! In this article, we will go over what is AdvCash and how it works. Furthermore, we will touch on how CoinCannon […]

item.content:encoded:
E-wallets have been a great online service for payment solutions. And of course, there are multiple options to choose from. However, for those in need of hassle-free regulations, the options become very much limited! In this article, we will go over what is AdvCash and how it works. Furthermore, we will touch on how CoinCannon platform can help customers with its hassle-free KYC requirements for AdvCash transactions. What is AdvCash? A payment system that is compatible with Mastercard.

What is AdvCash?

AdvCash is a currency used for online payments. It is based in Belize which provides immunity from national laws of other countries for it. As an offshore currency, it is also encrypted much like cryptocurrencies and benefits from better anonymity and security. The Advance Cash company provides an account for users that allows for a variety of currencies to operate through it. In many ways, it is a lot like Payeer.

And much like Payeer, AdvCash supports transfers in both fiat and cryptocurrency form. With a virtual wallet, users can transfer funds and make payments with very low commission. What makes it interesting, is that Advance Cash is also compatible with other payment systems such as WebMoney or Perfect Money. With free international transfers, users get to enjoy a wide variety of currencies all in a virtual wallet. Furthermore, there are both physical and virtual bank cards available for quick and cheap international Visa/Mastercard payments.

The company was founded in 2014 as a competitor for PayPal and much like its peers, it has gained notable success in the past few years. As the need for virtual banking grows, online payment processing companies continue to narrow the gap with PayPal. Although, such companies are not as popular as PayPal, they offer a lot more freedom.

AdvCash Pros and Cons

Now that we’ve gone over what is AdvCash, let’s take a look at some of the pros and cons.

The platform does offer numerous advantages and here are some of the most noteworthy:

Pros:

  • No Fee for internal operations
  • Virtual Cards are a great tool
  • Cards that offer free service
  • High Security and lots of safety features
  • Low Fees
  • Crypto Support

Cons:

  • No Service in the US
  • Anonymous Owner, nobody knows who founded the company
  • Irreversible transactions
  • No Smartphone application available yet.

Does CoinCannon Support AdvCash?

Yes, you can Buy AdvCash on CoinCannon with Perfect Money or exchange AdvCash to PayPal. CoinCannon offers the best exchange rates as well as 24/7 online support. And to respect anonymity, the platform does not require KYC or Sign Up.

The post What is AdvCash? Underrated E-Wallet! appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.content:encoded:
Tired of hefty exchange fees?

Well, you’ve come to the right place! You can exchange Perfect Money to PayPal on CoinCannon with the lowest fees as well as 24/7 customer support.

Perfect Money is an e-wallet for exchanging payments, saving cryptocurrencies or fiat currencies, shopping online, gaining interest, and more. It is a great alternative for making digital payments and is growing in popularity. You can seamlessly exchange Perfect Money USD to PayPal USD on CoinCannon without paying outrageous fees. Let’s continue to show you the best way to exchange Perfect Money to PayPal.

Exchange Perfect Money to PayPal Right Now!

Why Exchange Perfect Money to PayPal?

Exchange PM WMZ to PayPal USD offers a seamless way to CoinCannon the gap between two popular online payment systems. Perfect Money, known for its versatility and usage across various online platforms, can be effortlessly converted to PayPal USD.

But why choose to exchange Perfect Money to PayPal? PayPal is a widely accepted and trusted online payment platform, making it a preferred choice for many online transactions.

Whether you’re looking to make purchases, send money to friends or family, or simply want to access your funds in a more widely accepted form, exchanging Perfect Money to PayPal allows you to tap into PayPal’s extensive network and enjoy the convenience and security it offers.

Advantages of Exchanging Perfect Money to PayPal

PayPal is an online trade company that, through online transfers, facilitates payments between parties. Its system allows clients to set up an account on its platform that is linked to the user’s credit card or checking account.

Upon confirmation of identification and proof of funds, through the website or application of the company, users can begin sending or receiving payments online to and from other PayPal accounts.

As mentioned above, in order to transfer money to others using the receiver’s email address or mobile phone number, PayPal account holders can use the website or mobile application of the company.

Within only a matter of minutes, transactions go through and the company promises that transfers are immediately available for payment or withdrawal to a bank account.

The ease of use and the wide acceptance makes the exchange cryptocurrencies to PayPal one of the best options when you need some cash to spend online.

How to Exchange Perfect Money to PayPal on CoinCannon

Now let’s have a look on how we can exchange Perfect Money to PayPal on CoinCannon:

Step 1: Enter the Homepage on CoinCannon. Select Perfect Money on the left field and PayPal on the right one. Enter the exchange amount and wait for the rates to apply.

Step 2: Click on Exchange and you go to the next step where you will need to enter your PayPal account details, Perfect Money address, email, and phone number (optional).

Step 3: Click on “Exchange” one more time as you go to the next page to review your order.

Step 4: At this point, you will obtain your Tracking ID, an address and an explorer URL.

Step 5: On this step, please dedicate some time to review our terms and conditions and the instructions.

Step 6 : Transfer your Perfect Money to the CoinCannon wallet address that is provided for you.

Step 7: Finally, click on the “I’ve paid” button.

Done!

After finishing the steps above, our team will process your order and transfer the funds to your PayPal. Bear in mind that PayPal payments might take a short while.

If at any point, you have any questions or problems, feel free to contact the support team 24/7 via the live chat section on the website.

Why Choose CoinCannon for Exchanging Perfect Money to PayPal USD?

CoinCannon is an online exchange that offers everything you need from a platform.

Truthfully, it is a rare combination for an online exchange to offer anonymity, lowest exchange rates and unparalleled reliability altogether.

We respect our customer’s privacy by not asking for their personal information. The best way for anyone to protect their information is to not disclose them at all. In that regard, not having KYC or sign up is the best method.

Furthermore, the platform utilizes an automated system to determine the best exchange rates at all times. Our words sound too good? Just pay a visit to ranking websites such as BestChange and OkChanger and see for yourself.

Lastly, according to Murphy’s law “anything that can go wrong will go wrong”. To stay ahead of any problems, we offer 24/7 customer support.

Tips for a Smooth Exchange Process of Perfect Money to PayPal

  • Verify Your Accounts: Ensure that your Perfect Money and PayPal accounts are both verified and in good standing to prevent any issues during the exchange process.
  • Check Exchange Rates: Keep an eye on the current exchange rates to ensure you get the best value for your Perfect Money when converting it to PayPal USD.
  • Review Transaction Details: Before confirming the exchange, carefully review all transaction details, including the amount to be exchanged and the exchange rate.
  • Use a Secure Connection: When conducting the exchange, make sure you are using a secure and encrypted internet connection to protect your financial information.
  • Choose a Trusted Exchange Platform: Start by selecting a reputable and reliable exchange platform like CoinCannon to ensure a secure and efficient transaction.
  • Follow Exchange Instructions: Follow the exchange platform’s instructions step by step, providing the required information accurately to avoid delays.
  • Keep Records: Maintain a record of the transaction details, including transaction IDs, emails, and receipts, for reference and security purposes.
  • Be Mindful of Processing Times: Understand that processing times may vary, so be patient and allow some time for the transaction to complete.
  • Contact Customer Support: If you encounter any issues or have questions during the exchange process, don’t hesitate to reach out to the exchange platform’s customer support for assistance.

The post How to Exchange Perfect Money USD to PayPal USD [2024 Update] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: Payeer Review 2022: How Good is it?
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
Online digital wallets are multiplying in numbers like crazy! In a fierce competition between payment gateways, the consumers are the real winners. Right now, the transaction fees are the lowest they have ever been, not to mention the global availability of such services. And today, it is time for a Payeer review to find out […]

The post Payeer Review 2022: How Good is it? appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
Online digital wallets are multiplying in numbers like crazy! In a fierce competition between payment gateways, the consumers are the real winners. Right now, the transaction fees are the lowest they have ever been, not to mention the global availability of such services. And today, it is time for a Payeer review to find out if the service is still on top of its competition. To begin with, before reading this year’s Payeer review, make sure you know all the basics about the digital wallet by reading “What is Payeer”. Having done that, let’s take a look at the Estonian digital wallet.

Payeer Review

First and foremost, Payeer is considered an online digital wallet for better asset management. Be it crypto of fiat, the payment processor is quick, reliable and cheap. In that regard, in a short lifespan of almost 8 years, Payeer is now recognized as one of the very best amongst competitors. Payeer utilizes built-in payment services with giant financial services such as Mastercard, VISA and PayPal.

As of 2022, the Payeer has over 7 million users which can transfer funds to each other for free. The strength however, lies in diversity. Payeer is far ahead of any similar platform in terms of scale of operation and diversity in supported payment methods. With more than 50 payment approaches, the Payeer wallet offers users various services in one place.

All transactions made on Payeer are irreversible. A feature that minimizes the possibility of malicious attacks or unwanted third party interference. Furthermore, they offer great customer support for users.

There is always room for improvement. And in this economy, if a company does not make constructive improvement, they could quickly look irrelevant. Already, Payeer services have been top-notch considering pretty much everything. But, for this Payeer review, we’re looking at how does Payeer stack up against the competition in 2022.

Basically, there is no perfect digital wallet and users will have to choose their service based on their needs. With that, we should first consider the pros and cons and then decide if it’s right for us.

Pros

  • Payeer is also an online cryptocurrency exchange. They used to offer limited number of cryptocurrencies but have noticeably expanded the list
  • Users can easily withdraw from Payeer account from ATM machines which is simply awesome!
  • The affiliate program is extensive and better than the competition.
  • Payeer is always up to date with the latest features
  • The transaction fees are very low and transactions are very quick.
  • The mobile app is intuitive and easy to use

Cons

  • Despite providing services in over 100 countries, Payeer is not active in the US.
  • Privacy and anonymity are not anywhere close to cryptocurrencies.
  • Having a limit on transactions can deter institutions.
  • The minimum amount for trading cryptocurrencies is a bit high

Conclusion

Essentially, the diversity policy was the big bread winner for Payeer. In this Payeer review, it is important to mention that Payeer hit a jackpot with cryptocurrencies. They were one of the first digital wallets to accept both fiat and crypto and that was a big success. Similarly, we see other competitors rushing to diversify their list of digital assets.

For 2022, it seems like Payeer has put a lot more emphasis on cryptocurrencies. The digital wallet services were already good, but now they want to expand their online crypto exchange. However, the regulations and KYC requirements are still a bummer. Users can potentially use Payeer services without verification but will face strong limitations. Yet, overall, Payeer is still right there with the best of online digital wallets and payment settlement services.

jolixo

jolixo is a decentralized online platform to exchange your cryptocurrencies and e-currencies. We utilize an automated system to determine the best exchange rates at any moment. Furthermore, CoinCannon does not require KYC or a sign-up process. Also, the platform offers 24/7 customer support.

Learn how to exchange Payeer USD to PayPal [Video Guide]

For more instructional content, you can always visit CoinCannon Blog

The post Payeer Review 2022: How Good is it? appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
